otherNames: Ｂ’Ｔ　Ｘ（ビート・エックス）　ＮＥＯ
synopsis: Continuation of Teppei's journey with B't X to rescue his brother Kotaro Takamiya from the Machine Empire. The OAV series picks off from the TV series from the point where Hokuto successfully saves both Teppei and B't X and makes B't X far more powerful than before.
